page.title: 15Social Concerns
page.content: There is a strong community feeling in this area, the Over 60's club organise a yearly summer evening trip,free to all over 60's of the parish,at christmas a hamper or meat voucher and box of biscuits is provided for them. Events to raise money for the club are organised throughout the year and all the area gives their support. The W.I. also play an active roll in the welfare of the area,a keen interest is taken in the work of the Mentally Handicapped Organisations one member being part of the Edington Centre Support Group,Penrith also the Appleby Group of Friends for the Mentally Handicapped. Residents in the area also the Rotary,Inner Wheel and Ladies Circle groups which meet in Appleby and hold various events in aid of local charities.
